33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Bahriyyah, a Companion of Mu'adh bin Jabal narrated that the Prophet(s.a.w) said:"The great Malhamah, the conquest of Constantinople, and the coming of the Dajjal occur in (the span of) seven months

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي عَلاَمَاتِ خُرُوجِ الدَّجَّالِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Signs of the Coming of The Dajjal
